page.title: 09THE WAKES CARNIVAL
page.content: We all look forward to Wakes Week. It starts on the last Saturday in June with the carnival procession. This year the weather was lovely. Everyone who wanted, dressed up as something or someone to try to win a prize or just for fun. There are different sections for floats, animals and different age-groups. I went as a member of the Parwich cricket team. The Brownies went as a set of dominoes. Our headmaster, Mr. Williams and his wife were the judges. Cassie came first in our section as a beautiful butterfly and she won Â£1.00. The Nottingham Caravan Club come to Parwich every year for Wakes Week and they enter the fancy dress. This year they entered as nursery rhymes.
